hero_image.alt: Hero image for Lubricantes: De un Consumible Olvidado a la Piedra Angular de la Confiabilidad Industrial en 2026

image_prompt: A high-end industrial setting showing a diverse team of maintenance professionals (men and women of different ethnicities) performing a lubrication audit. One technician is using a professional handheld ultrasonic device to check a large, clean industrial motor, while another is taking a sample of oil from a dedicated sampling port into a clean glass bottle. They are wearing full PPE: white hard hats, clear safety glasses, and high-visibility vests over clean work uniforms. The environment is a modern, well-lit manufacturing facility with polished floors and organized machinery. The image is photo-realistic, professional, and shows the technicians from a medium distance (full body visible). No text or screens are visible.
